contract_name.description: The name of the document, e.g., 'Right of First Refusal Agreement'.

effective_date.description: The date the agreement was fully executed.

right_type.description: Right of First Refusal (ROFR) or Right of First Offer (ROFO).

property_description.description: A description of the property subject to the right.

triggering_event.description: The event that triggers the right (e.g., 'Owner's intent to sell', 'Receipt of a third-party offer').

procedure_summary.description: A summary of the notification and exercise process.

exercise_period.description: The time the holder has to exercise their right.
